trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when attempting to apply an operator to incompatible operands when you evaluate a rule.
trans-unit.target: A exceção é acionada ao tentar aplicar um operador para operandos incompatíveis ao avaliar uma regra.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> com uma mensagem de erro especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the message parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>propriedade da instância do novo utilizando o parâmetro de mensagem.</xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de exceção.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| A cadeia de mensagem de erro. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the error message to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> que contém a mensagem de erro para associar a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> classe com dados serializados.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado durante a anulação da serialização para reconstitute o objeto de exceção transmitido através de uma transmissão em fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados de objecto serializado sobre a exceção que está a ser emitida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a nível contextual das informações sobre a origem ou de destino.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: serializeInfo is a null reference (Visual Basic ).
trans-unit.target: serializeInfoé uma referência nula (Visual Basic ).

trans-unit.source: The class name is a null reference (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) or the <xref:System.Exception.HResult*> is zero.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe é uma referência nula (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>) ou o <xref:System.Exception.HResult*>é zero.</xref:System.Exception.HResult*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of this <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> classe com uma mensagem de erro especificado e uma referência a interna <xref:System.Exception>que é a causa da <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>que é acionada como resultado direto de anterior <xref:System.Exception>deve incluir uma referência a exceção anterior no <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade devolve o mesmo valor que é transmitido no construtor ou uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) se o <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade não fornecer o valor da exceção interna para o construtor.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem que descreve a exceção atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>instância que causou a exceção atual.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> classe com os detalhes de violação de compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de exceção representada por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| O valor do argumento `message`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>| O valor do argumento `left.`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>| O valor do argumento `op.`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>| O valor do argumento `right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem que descreve <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> atual

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>volte a aparecer no lado esquerdo do operador.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref> que representa o operador cuja compatibilidade é violada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>volte a aparecer à direita do operador.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"> </xref> classe com os detalhes de violação de compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: This includes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de exceção representada por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The value of the argument `ex.`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| O valor do argumento `ex.`| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| O valor do argumento `message`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>| O valor do argumento `left.`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>| O valor do argumento `op.`| | <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>| O valor do argumento `right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem que descreve <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> atual

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>volte a aparecer no lado esquerdo do operador.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref> que representa o operador cuja compatibilidade é violada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>volte a aparecer à direita do operador.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>instância que causou a exceção atual.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com informações sobre a exceção.

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Invocar GetObjectData define um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>com todos os o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException>dados direcionados para a serialização de objetos.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During de-serialization, this exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: Durante a anulação da serialização, esta exceção é reconstituted do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>transmitidos através do fluxo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados de objecto serializado sobre a exceção que está a ser emitida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a nível contextual das informações sobre a origem ou de destino.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Type>do argumento esquerdo da expressão fazendo com que a exceção.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do argumento esquerdo da expressão fazendo com que a exceção.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref> que representa o operador que causou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref> que representa o operador que causou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Type>do argumento direita da expressão fazendo com que a exceção.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do argumento direita da expressão fazendo com que a exceção.</xref:System.Type>
